blogPost.excerpt: Salut is a creator platform for fitness pros. We make it fun and easy for fitness creators to build and monetize a community. Schedule, stream, socialize, and monetize virtual fitness content - all in one app for free.
blogPost.body: Salut is a creator platform for fitness pros. We make it fun and easy for fitness creators to build and monetize a community. Schedule, stream, socialize, and monetize virtual fitness content - all in one app for free.
blogPost.title: Salut - The creator platform for fitness
blogPost.author: Justin Mitchell

previous.excerpt: Stack is an experimental product from Google's internal incubator Area 120 which makes it easy to scan and organize your documents. It uses Google Cloud's Document AI to understand the meaning of the documents you scan, or upload from your camera roll.
previous.title: Stack by Area 120 at Google - All your documents, organized with Google's document AI

localize.description: Stack是谷歌内部孵化器Area 120的一款实验性产品，它可以让你轻松扫描和整理文件。它使用谷歌云的文档AI来理解你扫描的文档，或者从你的相机卷上传的文档的含义。
localize.tagline: 你的所有文件，用谷歌的文档AI来组织。

localize.description: Stack是谷歌內部孵化器Area 120的一款實驗性產品，它可以讓你輕鬆掃描和整理文件。它使用谷歌雲的文檔AI來理解你掃描的文檔，或者從你的相機捲上傳的文檔的含義。
localize.tagline: 你的所有文件，用谷歌的文檔AI來組織。

next.excerpt: Obsidian is an OTP Authenticator designed for security, privacy, usability and seamless synchronisation across devices.
next.title: Obsidian 2.0 - OTP authenticator for iOS & macOS

localize.description: 黑曜石是一款为安全、隐私、可用性和跨设备无缝同步而设计的OTP认证器。
黑曜石是一款爲安全、隱私、可用性和跨設備無縫同步而設計的OTP認證器。
